meanings.definition: A place to live or stay
meanings.sent1: The cozy cabin in the woods was the perfect accommodation for our weekend getaway.
meanings.sent2: The hotel room was a comfortable accommodation during our vacation.
meanings.sent3: The tiny tent served as an accommodation for the adventurous campers.
meanings.sent4: The spacious mansion was an extravagant accommodation for the wealthy family.
meanings.sent5: The beachfront villa provided a luxurious accommodation for the honeymooners.

meanings.sent1: The school made an accommodation for the student with special needs by providing extra support.
meanings.sent2: Learning to use a wheelchair was a necessary accommodation after the accident.
meanings.sent3: The flexible schedule was an accommodation for the busy employees.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude was an accommodation to the challenging situation.
meanings.sent5: The new software update required an accommodation in the way we work.

meanings.definition: The act of providing lodging or space for someone
meanings.sent1: The hotel's accommodation of the guests was exceptional, with personalized service.
meanings.sent2: The shelter provided temporary accommodation for the homeless during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The generous offer of accommodation made the travelers feel welcome.
meanings.sent4: The accommodation of additional guests required rearranging the seating plan.
meanings.sent5: The accommodation of the refugees was a heartwarming display of compassion.

meanings.sent1: The agreement reached was a fair accommodation for both parties involved.
meanings.sent2: The flexible work hours were an accommodation for the employees' diverse needs.
meanings.sent3: The decision to split the bill evenly was an accommodation to avoid conflict.
meanings.sent4: The compromise on the location was an accommodation to ensure everyone could attend.
meanings.sent5: The adjusted deadline was an accommodation to allow for unforeseen delays.
